content: here s a handy embellishment this little lacy maple leaf is a perfect decorative motif but you can also make it in thicker yarn to be a coaster or thread to use as jewelry or an ornament while there are lots of maple leaf patterns out there this one is more open to reduce the required yardage i made this pattern specifically so that it could be made using less than one hank of embroidery floss these leaves are easy and fun to make and only take a few minutes to whip up it s hard to stop at just one samples pictured 1 earrings made with size 20 crochet thread and a 0 75 mm steel hook the leaves each came out about 1 inch across 2 decorations/appliques made with embroidery floss and a us size b 2 25 mm hook 3 coasters made with worsted weight cotton and a us size h 5 mm hook those came out about 5 inches across
